tree.name: org
tree.desc: 系统组织机构(不包含虚拟组织)

tree-mapping.tree:
` true
SA_OPORG ID PARENT_ID NAME ORG_KIND_ID,FULL_ID,FULL_NAME,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,CENTER_ID,CENTER_NAME,DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,POSITION_ID,POSITION_NAME parent_id =:orgRoot (status = :a or status = :b) SEQUENCE ASC

tree.name: excludePosOrg
tree.desc: 系统组织机构(排除岗位)

tree.name: spLogicArea
tree.desc: 战略合作伙伴逻辑区域

dataModel.label: ACCOUNT_NAME
dataModel.condition: (CHARGE_TYPE=0 OR CHARGE_TYPE = :chargeType) AND ACCOUNT_ID NOT IN ( SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM PM_SPECIAL_BAL_TYPE WHERE STATUS=1 AND ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL )

dataModel.label: ACCOUNT_NAME
dataModel.condition: ACCOUNT_ID NOT IN ( SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM PM_SPECIAL_BAL_TYPE WHERE STATUS=1 AND ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL )

tree.name: pmCustomerSatisType
tree.desc: 选择客户满意度提升项

tree.name: dispatchKindChoose
tree.desc: 根据组织查询发文类别

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.condition: (status = :status and (is_CENTER=0 OR IS_CENTER IS NULL) and( select count(1) from pm_project p where org_id in ( SELECT ID FROM sa_oporg org START WITH ID=t.id CONNECT BY PRIOR ID=PARENT_ID ))>0 )

tree.name: mdAdminAreaByLogicArea
tree.desc: 根据逻辑区查询关联的行政区域

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.root: admin_area_id = (select lal.admin_area_id from lim_admin_logic lal where lal.logic_area_id = :logicAreaId)

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.condition: (RESOURCE_KIND_ID is null or RESOURCE_KIND_ID ='project' or RESOURCE_KIND_ID=:resourceKindId) and (IS_MAIN_ORG is null or IS_MAIN_ORG=:isMainOrg) and (IS_PUBLIC is null or IS_PUBLIC=0 or IS_PUBLIC=:isPublic)

dataModel.table: (select t1.channel_category_id as channel_id, t1.channel_category_id, t1.code, t1.name, t1.name as channel_category_name, '' as channel_name, t1.parent_id, t1.sequence, t1.status, t1.source, 1 as type from sm_channel_category t1 union all select t2.channel_id, t2.channel_category_id, t2.code, t2.name, t3.name, t2.name, t2.channel_category_id as parent_id, t2.sequence, t2.status, t3.source, 2 as type from sm_channel t2, sm_channel_category t3 where t2.channel_category_id = t3.channel_category_id and t2.channel_id != 1 )
dataModel.label: NAME

dataModel.table: (select t1.channel_category_id as channel_id, t1.channel_category_id, t1.code, t1.name, t1.name as channel_category_name, '' as channel_name, t1.parent_id, t1.sequence, t1.status, t1.source, 1 as type from sm_channel_category t1 where exists (select 1 from sm_channel tt1, sm_channel_category tt2, sm_project_channel tt3 where tt1.channel_category_id = tt2.channel_category_id and tt1.channel_id = tt3.channel_id and (t1.channel_category_id = tt2.channel_category_id or instr(tt2.full_id,t1.channel_category_id)!=0 ) and tt1.status = 1 and tt3.project_id = :projectId) union all select t1.channel_id, t1.channel_category_id, t1.code, t1.name, t2.name, t1.name, t1.channel_category_id as parent_id, t1.sequence, t1.status, t2.source, 2 as type from sm_channel t1, sm_channel_category t2, sm_project_channel t3 where t1.channel_category_id = t2.channel_category_id and t1.channel_id = t3.channel_id and t1.status = 1 and t3.project_id = :projectId )
dataModel.label: NAME

tree.name: queryAdjustDetailYAxis
tree.desc: 预算编制纵向维度(明细)

tree.name: queryAdjustDetailXAxis
tree.desc: 预算编制横向维度(明细)

dataModel.table: (select building_id room_id, name room, stage_id parent_id from md_building where resource_kind_id = 'building' and stage_id = :projectStageId1 union select room_id, code room, building_id parent_id from md_room where resource_kind_id = 'room' and stage_id =:projectStageId2 )
dataModel.label: room
name
dataModel.root: project_id in (select parent_id from md_project where project_id =:projectStageId)

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.condition: QUEST_GROUP_ID IN (SELECT QUEST_GROUP_ID FROM SM_QUEST_GROUP WHERE QUEST_ID=:questId)

dataModel.table: (select name,full_name,parent_id,my_id from md_resource_business_type where parent_id='root' order by name)
dataModel.label: name
NAME
dataModel.root: PARENT_ID=(SELECT ed.options_ids FROM Bm_Entity_Dimension ed, bm_dimension_define dd where ed.entity_define_id=:entityDefineId and lower(dd.data_from_table)='bm_period' and ed.dimension_define_id=dd.dimension_define_id and rownum=1)

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.root: PARENT_ID=(SELECT ed.options_ids FROM Bm_Entity_Dimension ed, bm_dimension_define dd where ed.entity_define_id=:entityDefineId and lower(dd.data_from_table)='bm_period' and ed.dimension_define_id=dd.dimension_define_id and rownum=1)

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.root: PARENT_ID=(SELECT ed.options_ids FROM Bm_Entity_Dimension ed, bm_dimension_define dd where ed.entity_define_id=:entityDefineId and lower(dd.data_from_table)='bm_organize' and ed.dimension_define_id=dd.dimension_define_id and rownum=1)
dataModel.condition: and exists( select 1 from bm_authority ba,bm_filtrate_detail fd, sys_common_handler s,sa_oporg so,bm_organize o where fd.yaxis_id='dim01A'||o.organize_id and fd.biz_id=s.biz_id and o.full_id like t.full_id||'%' and ba.entity_define_id = :entityDefineId and so.person_id = :personId and so.full_id like s.full_id||'%' and ba.authority_id = fd.biz_id and ba.authority_kind_id='view' )

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.root: SUBJECT_ID=(SELECT ed.options_ids FROM Bm_Entity_Dimension ed, bm_dimension_define dd where ed.entity_define_id=:entityDefineId and lower(dd.data_from_table)='bm_subject' and ed.dimension_define_id=dd.dimension_define_id and rownum=1)

dataModel.label: NAME
dataModel.root: NVL(PARENT_ID,0)=0 and PAYMENT_NODE_KIND_ID= 1 and CODE like NVL(:code,'%%')
